T02D2148:241a-1: n'i l'am bar dhar badzra p'a nam ma h'a ya
T02D2148:241a-2: ksha ka la pam ma h'a tsa kra s'a dha
T02D2148:241a-3: na n'a ma / bod skad du /
T02D2148:241a-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo
T02D2148:241a-5: rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor
T02D2148:241a-6: lo chen po zhes bya ba /
T02D2148:241a-7: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2148:241a-8: 'gro ba kha cig sa bon gnas dang rtsol rkyen gyis //
T02D2148:241a-9: gdug pas zin cing dug dang khrag ni 'dres gyur pa //
T02D2148:241a-10: thabs gzhan du ma gang gis 'byed bar mi nus te //
T02D2148:241a-11: 'dab bzangs rgyal pos chu dang 'o ma 'byed pa bzhin //
T02D2148:241a-12: gdug pa 'dul phyir dbang bskur ji srid mnyes byas pas //
T02D2148:241a-13: des ni 'byed cing gsal bar bod pa yin pa ste //
T02D2148:241a-14: brgyad khrir zhabs nub 'jig dus me dpung nang 'dug pa //
T02D2148:241a-15: gdug pa'i dgrar gyur ljags 'dril dbugs tsha mi shigs 'dzin //
T02D2148:241a-16: byol song rgyan ldan mche ba gtsigs shing nga ro 'jigs //
T02D2148:241a-17: de la lus ngag yid gsum dang bas gus btud de //
T02D2148:241a-18: ji srid mnyes byas dam pa'i drin gyis man ngag ri //
T02D2148:241a-19: rang nyams myang bas dug zin sgrub po rjes su dran //
T02D2148:241a-20: de la rgyal po dang rkun po dang stag la
T02D2148:241a-21: sogs pa yang ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ri'am
T02D2148:241a-22: / yid du 'ong ba'i gnas 'du 'dzi med pa
T02D2148:241a-23: gang yang rud bar rnal 'byor bas khrus byas te
T02D2148:241a-24: / / stan bde ba la 'dug nas rang gi
T02D2148:241a-25: snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um
T02D2148:241b-1: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma
T02D2148:241b-2: snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02D2148:241b-3: bla ma dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul te
T02D2148:241b-4: byon par bsams la mchod pa lngas yang dag par
T02D2148:241b-5: mchod la sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o
T02D2148:241b-6: // de'i rjes la byams pa dang snying rje dang
T02D2148:241b-7: dga' ba dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i
T02D2148:241b-9: de nas gcig dang dum dang bral ba'i blos phyi
T02D2148:241b-10: nang gi dngos po thams cad stong zhing bdag med
T02D2148:241b-11: par bsam mo // aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a
T02D2148:241b-12: dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konyham zhes bya
T02D2148:241b-14: de nas gur dang rab la sogs pa sa bon las bsams te /
T02D2148:241b-15: sa bon gyi yi ge las byung ba yongs su
T02D2148:241b-16: gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi 'khor lo
T02D2148:241b-17: rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang bcas pa sgo bzhi rta
T02D2148:241b-18: babs bzhi dang ldan pa dur khrod chen po'i dbus
T02D2148:241b-19: su'o // de'i lte ba la tshangs pa dang /
T02D2148:241b-20: brgya byin gyi thog na nyi ma dang zla ba /
T02D2148:241b-24: byang gnod sbyin de rnams kyi steng du nyi ma'o //
T02D2148:241b-25: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i nyi zla'i thog tu ni /
T02D2148:241b-26: sprin sgra'i yi ge yongs su gyur pa las thod
T02D2148:241b-27: pa dang khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam
T02D2148:241b-28: mo // de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu gangg'a'i klung gi
T02D2148:241b-29: bye ma snyad kyi sangs rgyas rnams sbyan drangs te
T02D2148:241b-30: mo // / bstims nas de yongs su gyur pa
T02D2148:241b-31: las sangs rgyas gos sngon po can zhal gsum phyag
T02D2148:241b-32: mo // / drug pa / zhabs g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang pa /
T02D2148:241b-33: sku mdog mthing nag spyan gsum me'i phung po 'dra ba /
T02D2148:241b-34: smin ma dang dpral bar khro gnyer du bsdus pa /
T02D2148:241b-35: ljags 'dril zhing mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2148:241b-36: nga ro'i sgra 'byung zhing dbugs me ltar 'bar ba /
T02D2148:241b-37: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D2148:241b-38: ral pa'i cod pan la sogs pa la sbrul mgo brgyad kyi gdengs ka yod pa /
T02D2148:241b-39: de'i dkyil na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo
T02D2148:241b-40: mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po g-yon brkyang g-yas
T02D2148:241b-42: gdug pa can zhe la mnan nas sdigs mdzub can no //
T02D2148:241b-43: zhal g-yas dung dang 'dra ba g-yon padma r'a ga
T02D2148:241b-44: 'dra ba dbus sku dang mthun pa zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2148:241b-46: gsus pa yangs shing gsus pa 'khyil ba ste /
T02D2148:242a-0: phyag g-yas kyi dang po rdo rje 'phyar @242a * //
T02D2148:242a-2: g-yon dang po sdigs mdzub 'chang ba /
T02D2148:242a-3: bar pa gnyis yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2148:242a-4: tha ma gnyis sbrul rked pa nas gzung zhing za ba'o //
T02D2148:242a-5: rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi
T02D2148:242a-6: ge h'um dang ldan pa'i gos sngon po stag gi
T02D2148:242a-8: klu rigs bzhi rgyan du byas pa ni nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan pa /
T02D2148:242a-9: dga' bo dang nye dga' 'bar bas snyan cha byas pa /
T02D2148:242a-10: padma dang chu lhas lag pa brgyan pa /
T02D2148:242a-11: stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan khar za ba can gyi ska rags byas pa ste /
T02D2148:242a-12: de ltar bdud la sogs pa brlag pa can du bdag nyid bsgom mo //
T02D2148:242a-13: lha mo mdzes ldan sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2148:242a-14: phyag g-yas pa gri gug gtso bo la 'khyud pa /
T02D2148:242a-15: g-yon pa thod pa khrag gis gang ba gtso bo'i zhal du stobs pa'o //
T02D2148:242a-16: de'i sbyor ba'i mtshams nas shar phyogs kyi padma'i steng
T02D2148:242a-17: du thig le kha sbyor 'phros pa las thod pa
T02D2148:242a-18: dang / rdo rjer gyur te rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2148:242a-19: khro bo bdud las rgyal byed sku mdog dkar po
T02D2148:242a-20: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa g-yas kyi dang po rdo
T02D2148:242a-21: rje 'phyar ba / g-yon gyi dang po rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2148:242a-22: 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub brang du bsnol bas yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2148:242a-23: gos sngon po stag gi ris can man bas pa'o//
T02D2148:242a-24: thod pa de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo
T02D2148:242a-25: 'od zer can sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag
T02D2148:242a-26: gnyis pa phyag g-yas pa sbu gris gtso bo la
T02D2148:242a-27: 'khyud pa / g-yon pa bhan dha khrag gis bkang ba gtso bo'i zhal du stobs pa'o //
T02D2148:242a-28: lho phyogs kyi padma'i steng du thag le kha sbyor
T02D2148:242a-29: 'phros pas thod pa dang rdo ba rjer gyur te
T02D2148:242a-30: / rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las khro
T02D2148:242a-31: bo rdo rje gzi brjid 'bar ba sku mdog ser
T02D2148:242a-32: po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02D2148:242a-33: g-yas dang po rdo rje 'phyar ba /
T02D2148:242a-34: g-yon gong ma dbyug to 'dzin pa 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub ba snol ma yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2148:242a-35: gos sngon po stag gi ris can man bas pa'o ;
T02D2148:242a-36: / thod pa de yongs su gyur pa las lha
T02D2148:242a-37: mo mdangs can ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig
T02D2148:242a-38: phyag gnyis pa g-yas na zangs gri /
T02D2148:242a-39: g-yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang nas zhal du stob cing gtso bo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2148:242a-40: nub phyogs kyi padma'i steng du thig le kha sbyor
T02D2148:242b-0: 'phros pa las thod @242b ba dang rdo rjer gyur
T02D2148:242b-1: te / rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las khro
T02D2148:242b-2: bo rngam ba sgra sgrogs sku mdog dmar po zhal
T02D2148:242b-4: g-yas dang po rdo rje 'phyar ba /
T02D2148:242b-5: g-yon dang po sbrul zhugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2148:242b-6: 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bsnol ma yum la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2148:242b-7: thod pa de yongs su gyur pa las//
T02D2148:242b-8: lha mo sgra can ma sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D2148:242b-9: g-yas pa na sta re g-yon pa thod pa gtso bo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2148:242b-10: byang phyogs su padma'i steng du thig le kha sbyor
T02D2148:242b-11: 'phros pa las rdo rje dang thod par gyur te
T02D2148:242b-12: / rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las khro
T02D2148:242b-13: bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog ljang gu zhal
T02D2148:242b-14: gcig phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas kyi dang po rdo
T02D2148:242b-15: / rje 'phyar ba / g-yon gong ma be con 'dzin pa /
T02D2148:242b-16: 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bsnol bas yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2148:242b-17: gos sngon po stag gi ris can mnabs pa'o //
T02D2148:242b-18: thod pa de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo
T02D2148:242b-19: rlung 'byin ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag
T02D2148:242b-20: gnyis pa phyag g-yas na 'khor lo /
T02D2148:242b-21: g-yon na thod pa gtso bo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2148:242b-22: shar gyi sgor thig le 'phros pa las /
T02D2148:242b-23: lcags kyu de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo
T02D2148:242b-24: lcags kyu ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag
T02D2148:242b-25: gnyis pa phyag g-yas na lcags kyu thogs pa'o //
T02D2148:242b-26: lho'i sgor thig le 'phros pa las zhags par gyur te /
T02D2148:242b-27: de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo zhags pa
T02D2148:242b-28: ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D2148:242b-30: nub kyi sgor thig le 'phros pa las lcags sgrog tu gyur te /
T02D2148:242b-31: de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo lcags sgrog
T02D2148:242b-32: ma sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis na
T02D2148:242b-34: byang gi sgor thig le 'phros pa las dril bur gyur te /
T02D2148:242b-35: de yongs grub pa las lha mo dril bu ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2148:242b-36: phyag na dril bu bsnams pa zla ba'i steng na thabs shes rab kyi tshul gyis bzhugs ba'o ;
T02D2148:242b-37: de nas rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2148:242b-38: la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las 'od zer 'phros
T02D2148:242b-39: pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra ba'i ye
T02D2148:242b-40: shes kyi dkyil 'khor sbyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam
T02D2148:242b-41: mkha' la bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing /
T02D2148:243a-0: snying gnas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang @243a * //
T02D2148:243a-1: dag par mchod pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2148:243a-2: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa'i phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa dang /
T02D2148:243a-3: gzhug pa dang bcing ba la sogs pas tha mi dad par bya'o //
T02D2148:243a-4: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gis sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab ba'i phyir /
T02D2148:243a-5: aom dang a'a: dang h'um ste dkar po dang dmar
T02D2148:243a-6: po dang mthing ga'i rim pas sbyi bo dang mgrin
T02D2148:243a-7: pa dang / snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgom mo //
T02D2148:243a-8: de nas snying ga na gnas pa'i h'um las 'od
T02D2148:243a-9: zer 'phros pas gangg'a'i klung gi sangs rgyas rnams sbyan
T02D2148:243a-10: drangs te / de dag kun gyi phyag na bum
T02D2148:243a-11: pa rdo rje rtse lnga bas mtshan pas snyoms par
T02D2148:243a-12: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur
T02D2148:243a-13: drangs te / ro // de nas gtso bo nas byang sgo la thug par bsgom mo //
T02D2148:243a-14: skyon thun mtshams bzhir rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2148:243a-15: de ltar lha ni gsal ba dang //
T02D2148:243a-16: sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis //
T02D2148:243a-18: thabs dang shes rab sbyor bas ni //
T02D2148:243a-19: bde chen rab tu gso mdzad nas //
T02D2148:243a-20: sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02D2148:243a-21: thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs kyis //
T02D2148:243a-22: bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms par mdzad //
T02D2148:243a-23: ces bya bas bsgom pa bstan nas /
T02D2148:243a-24: gtor ma btang la yang dag par mchod nas skyo
T02D2148:243a-25: bar gyur na sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gis gsungs pa
T02D2148:243a-28: bho bho b'an n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye
T02D2148:243a-29: ai dam n'i l'a mba ra dha ra sha r'i
T02D2148:243a-30: ram badzra p'a ni hri da yan ya sa ma
T02D2148:243a-31: ti kra ma ti autsh'a dha nam bha bi shuddhi
T02D2148:243a-32: h'um h'um / aom badzra kra ma ya phat /
T02D2148:243a-34: kri t'a nta r'u pa ya phat /
T02D2148:243a-36: aom bi d'a ra n'a ya phat /
T02D2148:243a-37: kri dha s'a dha n'a ya phat /
T02D2148:243a-38: n'i lam ba sa n'a ya phat /
T02D2148:243a-39: aa pra ti ha ta b'a la ya phat /
T02D2148:243a-42: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
T02D2148:243a-43: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D2148:243a-47: dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya / zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2148:243a-48: de nas sbyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2148:243a-49: rigs pas rang byung sku nyid rang gsal rtogs //
T02D2148:243a-50: bla ma dang 'grogs dam pa'i drin gyis thob //
T02D2148:243a-51: rjes su gzung phyir rang nyams myong bas brtsams //
T02D2148:243a-52: zla ba ltar gsal dag cing dri med des //
T02D2148:243a-53: 'gro kun rtog pa'i dri mar bzhi nas //
T02D2148:243a-54: 'bras bu phyag na rdo rje dang 'drar shog /
T02D2148:243b-0: slob dpon chen po dz'a ba ri @243b pas mdzad
T02D2148:243b-1: pa'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba
T02D2148:243b-3: / pandi ta de ba p'u rna ma ti dang /
